医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
尽管佛罗里达州有新法律，医生仍不愿询问患者的移民身份由于担心失去工作、危及国家对其机构的资助以及进一步将医疗保健政治化，佛罗里达州医院领导一直不愿公开反对一项要求他们询问患者移民身份的新法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Doctors-hesitate-to-ask-about- Patientse28099-immigration-status-despite-new-Florida-law.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Doctors-hesitate-to-ask-about- Patientse28099-immigration-status-despite-new-Florida-law.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c81f20f1-5bc6-4fef-baa9-69b0ddeb681a Thu, 17 Aug 2023 07:55:18 -0400 Doctors hesitate to ask about patients’ immigration status despite new Florida law
高额医疗债务社区质疑医院的慈善支出由于 41% 的美国成年人面临医疗债务，这座科罗拉多州南部城市的居民认为，当地的非营利性医院没有提供足够的慈善医疗服务，无法证明他们获得的数百万美元的税收减免是合理的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Community-with-high-medical-debt-questions-its-hospitalse28099-charity-spending.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Community-with-high-medical-debt-questions-its-hospitalse28099-charity-spending.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b9aa968-b3e2-4a7c-a9f8-2d183a4ac119 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 07:52:25 -0400 Community with high medical debt questions its hospitals’ charity spending
研究探讨了患有心血管疾病的美国成年人的电子烟趋势一篇新论文讨论了患有心血管疾病 (CVD) 的美国成年人使用电子烟的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-explores-vaping-trends-among-US-adults-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-explores-vaping-trends-among-US-adults-with-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ebfa49e-8a8e-4d5a-9dce-19fbb3d48e49 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 07:41:00 -0400 Study explores vaping trends among US adults with cardiovascular disease
研究探索利用集体智慧来改善医疗诊断最近的一项研究揭示了将知识表示模型和集体智慧结合起来进行医学诊断的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-explores-the-use-of-collective-intelligence-to-improve-medical-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-explores-the-use-of-collective-intelligence-to-improve-medical-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ea49ec0-4b0f-4466-8f9c-53a98b664bdb Thu, 17 Aug 2023 06:49:00 -0400 Study explores the use of collective intelligence to improve medical diagnosis
FDA 的执法是否改变了美国年轻人对电子烟的使用？最近的一项研究在美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 的执法指导下分析了美国青少年使用电子烟的程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Has-FDA-enforcement-changed-e-香烟-use-among-the-US-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Has-FDA-enforcement-changed-e-香烟-use-among-the-US-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11af96ec-5168-46e3-9c33-201cb910b41e Thu, 17 Aug 2023 06:38:00 -0400 Has FDA enforcement changed e-cigarette use among the US youth?
轮班工作是否与抑郁和焦虑有关？如果是，生活方式是否会调节这种关联？研究人员讨论了生活方式因素对轮班工人抑郁和焦虑的影响https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Is-shift-work-linked-with-depression-and-anxiety-and-if-so-does-lifestyle-mediate-the-associations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Is-shift-work- Associated-with-depression-and-anxiety-and-if-so-does-lifestyle-mediate-the-associations.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73857019-aa8e-4c4d-923d-7a2615f7397a Thu, 17 Aug 2023 06:14:00 -0400 Is shift work associated with depression and anxiety, and if so, does lifestyle mediate the associations?
新研究提供了阿尔茨海默病各阶段死亡风险的初步估计研究人员检查了阿尔茨海默病各个阶段的人们的预期生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/New-study-offers-preliminary-estimates-of-mortality-risk-by-stage-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/New-study-offers-preliminary-estimates-of-mortality-risk-by-stage-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b14caf65-5756-44ff-ab8f-da0cf145b686 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:19:00 -0400 New study offers preliminary estimates of mortality risk by stage in Alzheimer's disease

机器学习算法能否识别有延迟开始癌症治疗风险的患者？多级机器学习模型，用于估计大量癌症患者的癌症诊断和治疗开始之间的延迟风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Can-machine-learning-algorithms-identify-病人-at-risk-of-a-delay-in-starting-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Can-machine-learning-algorithms-identify-病人-at-risk-of-a-delay-in-starting-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca57ffc7-e639-4121-aeab-284d745450e1 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 04:05:00 -0400 Can machine learning algorithms identify patients at risk of a delay in starting cancer treatment?
